Narrating the Legacies of the Mao Era
Xi Jinping, the CCP general secretary and state president at the time of writing,
draws on Maoist rhetoric and the legacy of the early PRC more frequently and
consciously than any other leader in the Reform era.Xi has pointedly stated that
